author: LMG Clips
description:
https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips
Thanks to Secretlab for being the title sponsor of LMG Clips this year! Check out their ergonomic gaming chairs at the link above. Your back will thank you!

Dylan Ayrey and Jake King discovered a worrying backdoor in the Linux system in every 8 Sleep mattress covers thanks to a recent update. Linus and Luke discuss.

Check out Dylan Ayrey's and Jake King's article here: https://trufflesecurity.com/blog/removing-jeff-bezos-from-my-bed

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mk05ddf3mqg

title: They know when you're sleeping, they know when you're awake
